modName: Stormcloak Soldier - Grimnir Preset and Save Game
summary: Adds an additional Male Nord Preset based on Grimnir
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tSRKRh1.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i77.servimg.com/u/f77/16/93/29/59/grimni10.jpg[/img][/center]


_____

It's [url=http://www.facebook.com/GrumpyOldNord]Grimnir[/url], the badass grumpy old Nord from [url=http://www.facebook.com/Stormcloak.Soldier]Stormcloak Soldier[/url] on Facebook, as a preset, so you can play your own adventures as a badass grumpy old Nord. 


I thought about uploading a save game, but then said "frak it" and figured I'd do you all one better (but there is a save under optional files for those interested). Just slide your Male Nord preset to the far right, and there will be Grimnir's fugly mug staring back at you (with his one good eye).

_____

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]UPDATE!!![/size][/color][/b]

I have added a save converted from my Xbox 360 playthrough as an optional file.  Feel free to explore the vanilla world of Skyrim as I have shaped it in my adventures as Dovahkiin.  

_____

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

If you don't use NMM or MO, just download manually, extract the archive with whatever unzipping tool you use (7zip, WinRar, etc.) and copy the enclosed Data folder to your main Skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located), overwrite the folder, then make sure you activate the mod in the Data Files of your Skyrim Launcher.

_____
